summary: This mod adds standalone vanilla ebony boots and gauntlets to the Champion of Boethia.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430164101.png[/img]

[center][color=#ff0000][size=3]== INFO ==[/size][/color][/center]

This mod adds vanilla ebony boots and gauntlets to the Champion of Boethiah. They use their own meshes - as I said, vanilla - and your default textures (this includes mods, such as the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487]aMidianBorn [/url]variants or the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21705]Dark Nemesis retexture[/url]).

This is intended for users who have replaced the default ebony boots' and gauntlets' models for ones noticeably bulkier or what-have-you, leaving your Ebony Mail looking a bit out of place. If you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/731240/?]nesusan[/url]'s [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60789]Reshaped Ebony Armor[/url] mod like I do, and don't like how the default ebony boots and gauntlets look with the Ebony Mail, then this mod is for you.

NOTE: The light ebony pieces, though called light, are heavy armor. They are counted as ebony gauntlets and boots, so the full-set boons will work with them.

[center][color=#ff0000][size=3]== COMPATIBILITY AND REQUIREMENTS ==[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][/color][/center][color=#ff0000]
[/color]
- There are no requirements for this mod, aside from Skyrim itself.
- I'm not sure if this mod will install correctly using NMM, but it probably will. Probably.
- This mod should be compatible with just about everything. To be on the safe side, it's probably best you keep the .esp loaded after any overhauls, such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url], which may change the equipment load-outs of NPCs.

[center][color=#ff0000][size=3]== CHANGE LOG ==[/size][/color][/center]
[color=#00ffff]
- v1.0 (May 14, 2015 @ 8:35 PM) - Adds the separate objects, but does not yet work as intended.
- v1.1 (May 14, 2015 @ 9:05 PM) - Fixed the ArmorAddon issue (which I should've done to begin with) and added the light pieces to the Champion of Boethiah.
- Misc. (May 14, 2015 @ 9:30 PM) - Added a picture, since I know some people are snappy about that. Yay!
- v1.2 (Work in progress) - Reshaping the light variants to make them more unique.
[/color]
[center][color=#ff0000][size=3]== CREDITS ==[/size][/color][color=#ff0000][/color][/center][color=#ff0000]
[/color]
- Bethesda - For the vanilla models and the Skyrim Creation Kit.
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1937976/?] AndalayBay[/url], Divstator, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/users/167469]ElminsterAU[/url], WrinklyNinja, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/156622/]zilav[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4147439]Sharlikran[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit [/url]program.
-[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759] Ousnious[/url], Stuffed Bunny, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2442809]ChronoTrigger[/url], [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6356507/?]btn2k3[/url], Halofarm, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3350373/?]Groovtama[/url], and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686]Caliente[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio[/url] program.
- The "Forever Free" logo essentially belongs to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4825044]mysticentity[/url].
author: Percephere
